## Familiars

One of the following familiars are spawned at random. All familiars grant a [passive](/familiarPassive/) ability, which provides the caster with a unique buff depending on the type of familiar, lasting until the end of the summon duration.

Familiars can be controlled and can attack, but are not particularly strong, and don't possess any castable abilities.

|-
